title: Animated Wallpaper in League Displays
body: in League Displays the new wallpaper and screensaver software , you can add animated wallpapers ?

replies.body:
The[ screen saver app](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207525756-League-Screensaver-FAQ) can show animated screensavers.  You can have a slideshow of different wallpapers, but it's not setup to animate them currently.

As an update, it looks like this is currently intended via this [reddit response](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7hj6t0/introducing_league_displays_desktop_app_the_best/dqrgnip/). They were unable to find a solution at the time that wouldn't compromise performance.

I created an app to do this before, before league displays anyway. 
([http://www.rediscussed.com/lol-desktop-background-league-of-legends/](http://www.rediscussed.com/lol-desktop-background-league-of-legends/))
Riot are right though, depending on your cpu your performance could take a hit with an AMD FX-8320 it uses 4-10% usage. The video bitrate also matters.
The best way to combat this is to lower the process priority, also I will look into pausing or even removing the process whilst in game.

I've tested it on Win 7, 8 and 10. I managed to hook windows 8 so that the animation is fully behind the icons (special way rito), 7 and 10 for some reason the icons will be hidden but the animation will still act liek your normal desktop wallpaper. Although I know a work around and may implement it.
